survey_name: Patient Satisfaction with Telehealth Services Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from patients who have used telehealth services to understand their satisfaction levels, identify areas for improvement, and enhance future telehealth offerings.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall telehealth experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for better granularity in responses. Ensure the scale is balanced with clear labels.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons. Include a 'Prefer not to answer' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall telehealth experience?

questions.question_text: Which of the following telehealth features did you use during your appointment? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to capture diverse usage patterns. Ensure the options cover common telehealth features.
questions.scripter_notes: Multi-choice checkboxes. Allow for 'Other' with a text field if needed.

script.question_text: Which of the following telehealth features did you use during your appointment? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing a telehealth appointment over an in-person visit?
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to identify key motivators. Include an 'Other' option for unlisted reasons.
questions.scripter_notes: Single-choice radio buttons with an optional text field for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What was the primary reason for choosing a telehealth appointment over an in-person visit?

questions.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling your telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to assess the scheduling process. Ensure clarity in wording.

script.question_text: How would you rate the ease of scheduling your telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: Were there any technical difficulties during your telehealth appointment?
questions.client_notes: Simple yes/no question to identify technical issues. Include a 'Not sure' option for clarity.

script.question_text: Were there any technical difficulties during your telehealth appointment?

questions.question_text: If you experienced technical difficulties, please describe the issue(s).
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture specific technical problems. Helps in troubleshooting and improving the service.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with optional character limit.

script.question_text: If you experienced technical difficulties, please describe the issue(s).

questions.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?
questions.client_notes: 5-point Likert scale to gauge future intent. Useful for measuring patient retention in telehealth.

script.question_text: How likely are you to use telehealth services again in the future?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telehealth services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to collect qualitative feedback. Valuable for service enhancement.
questions.scripter_notes: Open-text field with optional character limit.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for telehealth services?
